name: Pikmin 1 Randomizer
storyline: Meet Captain Olimar and a capable cast of red, blue, and yellow Pikmin on a dire mission across a larger-than-life planet. Olimar must guide his loveably-leafy companions through obstacles, in battle, and when collecting his missing ship parts.
summary: A hack for Pikmin 1 that swaps the locations of ship parts, enemies, and more. Face hordes of creatures in areas they wouldn't be in otherwise! Are you up to the challenge?
